Oops! There might be a problem with your payment method. Here are some tips to check out again:

1.Please check card number, CVV and expiry date again.
2.Change card to pay again.
3.Consult the issuing bank to know if the card is restricted or blocked.
4.Try another payment method.
5.The network congested. You can try again later.

Cash on Delivery is a payment method which floryday provides for Saudi Arabia, Kuwait and Jordan clients. By using this service, you can pay in cash to the delivery agent upon receiving your parcel. 1. Only orders between %1$s and %2$s are qulified for Cash on Delivery service. 2. Additional fee will be charged on Cash on Delivery orders. 3. It takes %3$s days for Aramex to delivery the Cash On Delivery orders.
Sorry, no related titles. Change your terms to find more related items
If you want to replace an order after opening, you just need to swipe the payment bar at the bottom of the vova-checkout page to confirm your payment.
OOPS! We are sorry that there might be a problem with your payment method. Meanwhile, our stuffs are always ready to help you out. Please be free to contact us.

pending means your payment need to be verified because of security protection. In this case, you need to send a photo of front side photo of bank card to verified the payment.

We have your back! You never have to worry when you shop on VOVA.

All you need to do is enter the e-mail address used in the delivery address when you ordered, and you will receive a mail with a web link sent to the e-mail address. After clicking into the page, you will retrive your order immediately.

We apologize for the inconvenience. There is a risk with your VOVA account. To protect customer’s account safety, we need a few pieces of information. Please send over two images of the following for verification:

You are in violation of the terms of our website. You are no longer permitted to participate in this even and the money in your wallet has been frozen.You can apply to unfreeze your wallet at Service@vova.com
*Your photo ID with your name and image showing clearly
*Front side photo of your bank card (The cardholder\'s name and the last four digits of the card number must show clearly)
We have received your uploads! You should receive a response from our representative within three business days.
